help.downloads:
---Help---
W    : Select the up one. 
S    : Select the down one. 
Space: Download the selected game. 
I    : Info of the version. 
G    : Search for versions. 
X    : Back to title.
help.launch:
---Help---
W    : Select the up one. 
S    : Select the down one. 
Space: Launch the selected version. 
F    : Open the the location directory of the selected version. 
R    : Rename the selected instance. 
D    : Remove the selected version. 
X    : Back to title.
help.settings:
---Help---
W    : Select the up one. 
S    : Select the down one. 
Space: Edit the selected item. 
X    : Back to title.

help.accounts:
---Help---
W    : Select the up one. 
S    : Select the down one. 
C    : Create a new account. 
D    : Remove the selected account. 
X    : Back to title.
help.main:
---Help---
A    : Select the left one. 
D    : Select the right one. 
Space: Switch to selected page. 
X    : Close the launcher.
update.build.4: Could now remove versions and accounts
update.build.5: Could now open location directories of instances
Would now downloads logging xml file
update.build.6: Would now ask to install Fabric
Could now see the info of Minecraft
Would now check Minecraft's sha1 hash value
update.build.7: Would now ask to install Optifime
update.build.8: Would now ask to install Forge
update.build.9: Would now open ".minecraft\versions" folder when pressing "f" in page "Launch" while no instances there
